text:
MaxClients should be usable in several more contexts, e.g. in VirtualServer, 
File, Directory, ...
creator: floeff@arcor.de

text:
I would say this is a WONTFIX or INVALID.

MaxClients cannot be applied to a File or Directory.  It is a global part of the
MPM.  Any attempt to make it per-{vhost,directory,file} would involve a large
overhaul of the scoreboard stuff. (likely new a new/better method.)  This does
not seem like a very viable feature.
creator: chip@force-elite.com
